alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:47AM EST until February 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 24.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.9 feet on 01/26/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued 11 PM Thursday, February 24th.
